channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
I'm trying to create my own server and the compiler isn't working. I keep getting this error that says "The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect. Press any key to continue." Here is what i have. @echo off title Server Compiler "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.6.0_03injavac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Do i need something different or is that right?

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @King_Ranzo King Ranzo
item.description:
@King_Ranzo wrote:

Alright I’m doing that now.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2008, 05:33:59 pm[/size][hr]I did it, the compiler worked. I started the server and tried using it on Moparscape but it says Error connecting to server. What might be wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2008, 06:03:27 pm[/size][hr]Bump for help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2008, 06:21:15 pm[/size][hr]Anybody?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.description:

Why does it always say you don’t have Java installed?

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

use this compiler my friend made it so give him credits
@echo off color 0a title AcId BliTZ c0mp1lEr if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @King_Ranzo King Ranzo
item.description:
@King_Ranzo wrote:

I’m trying to create my own server and the compiler isn’t working. I keep getting this error that says “The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect. Press any key to continue.” Here is what i have. @echo off
title Server Compiler
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.6.0_03injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Do i need something different or is that right?

Read full topic
